H0.text: Chemical energy is the type of energy that the potential energy of coal, oil, and natural gas is most directly converted into to benefit from the available energy.

H1.text: Electrical energy is the most direct type into which the potential energy of coal, oil, and natural gas is converted to harness their energy.

H2.text: Solar is the type of energy into which the potential energy of coal, oil, and natural gas is most directly converted to benefit from the energy available in these fossil fuels.

H3.text: Thermal energy is the most direct form into which the high potential energy of coal, oil, and natural gas is converted to obtain useful energy.

A4.text: the chemical potential energy has been converted into thermal energy

A5.text: chemical potential energy is converted into non-chemical energy
